Sentencas: Bismuth oxide based oxygen ion conductors are incorporated into (La,Sr)MnO3 (LSM), the classical cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), to improve the cathode performance.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized bismuth oxide (YSB) is taken as an example and is impregnated into a preformed porous LSM frame, forming a highly active cathode for intermediate-temperature SOFCs (IT-SOFCs) with doped ceria electrolytes.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: XY ray diffraction indicates that YSB is chemically compatible with LSM at intermediate temperatures below 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The impregnated YSB particles are nanosized and are deposited on the surface of the framework.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Significant performance improvement is achieved by introducing nanosized YSB into the LSM electrodes.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 600 degrees C, the interfacial polarization resistance under open-circuit conditions for electrodes impregnated with 50% YSB is only 1.3% ofthe original value for a pure LSM electrode.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The resistance is further reduced dramatically when current is passed through.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the YSB impregnated LSM electrodes has the highest electrochemical performance among those based on LSM.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single cell with 25% of YSB impregnated LSM cathode generates maximum power density of 300 mW cm(-2) at 600 degrees C, indicating the promise of using LSM-based electrodes for IT-SOFC.
Titulo: Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Nanoscale bismuth oxide im, regnated (La,Sr)MnO3 cathodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
